section_title: Extension of period and increase in aggregate of housing loans.
section_text: 1 1 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 2 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 3 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 4 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 5 In accordance with the foregoing provisions of this section— a section 1 of the  Armed Forces (Housing Loans) Act 1949 shall be amended as provided by Part I of the  Schedule to this Act  . . . b in the Armed Forces (Housing Loans) Act 1958, in section 2(1) for the words “the defence services” there shall be substituted the words “the service of the Ministry of Defence” . . .
2 This Act may be cited as the Armed Forces (Housing Loans) Act 1965.
